snippet: High-flying Premier League club Leicester City are in negotiations to sign Daniel Amartey from FC Copenhagen after making a bid for the Ghana international, the Danish club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Copenhagen Confirm Leicester Bid for Daniel Amartey
headline.print_headline: Copenhagen Confirm Leicester Bid for Daniel Amartey

lead_paragraph: High-flying Premier League club Leicester City are in negotiations to sign Daniel Amartey from FC Copenhagen after making a bid for the Ghana international, the Danish club said on Thursday.

snippet: Swansea City's club-record signing Borja Baston could be on the bench for Sunday's Premier League clash with Chelsea after missing the start of the season through injury, manager Francesco Guidolin said on Thursday....

headline.main: Swansea's Baston 'Almost Ready', Says Boss Guidolin
headline.print_headline: Swansea's Baston 'Almost Ready', Says Boss Guidolin

lead_paragraph: Swansea City's club-record signing Borja Baston could be on the bench for Sunday's Premier League clash with Chelsea after missing the start of the season through injury, manager Francesco Guidolin said on Thursday.

snippet: Ryan Giggs has ended his 29-year association with Manchester United by reaching a settlement with the Premier League club, the BBC reported on Friday....

headline.main: Giggs to Leave Man United After 29 Years: Report
headline.print_headline: Giggs to Leave Man United After 29 Years: Report

lead_paragraph: Ryan Giggs has ended his 29-year association with Manchester United by reaching a settlement with the Premier League club, the BBC reported on Friday.

snippet: Arsenal defender Gabriel has learnt a lesson from his clash with Chelsea striker Diego Costa earlier this campaign and will not let his team mates down again, the Brazilian has said....

headline.main: Arsenal's Gabriel Says Learnt Lesson From Costa Scuffle
headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Gabriel Says Learnt Lesson From Costa Scuffle

lead_paragraph: Arsenal defender Gabriel has learnt a lesson from his clash with Chelsea striker Diego Costa earlier this campaign and will not let his team mates down again, the Brazilian has said.

snippet: REUTERS - Crystal Palace coach Alan Pardew has warned fans that they should expect a season of transition from his side as they look to establish themselves higher up the Premier League table....

headline.main: Pardew Warns Palace Fans to Expect Transitional Season
headline.print_headline: Pardew Warns Palace Fans to Expect Transitional Season

lead_paragraph: REUTERS - Crystal Palace coach Alan Pardew has warned fans that they should expect a season of transition from his side as they look to establish themselves higher up the Premier League table.

snippet: Norwich City have only themselves to blame for being relegated in their first season back in the Premier League, according to captain Russell Martin....

headline.main: Relegated Norwich Have Only Themselves to Blame-Captain
headline.print_headline: Relegated Norwich Have Only Themselves to Blame-Captain

lead_paragraph: Norwich City have only themselves to blame for being relegated in their first season back in the Premier League, according to captain Russell Martin.

snippet: Manager Louis van Gaal has urged Manchester United to be cautious as they closed in on the Premier League's top four after Tuesday's 1-0 win over Watford at Old Trafford....

headline.main: Van Gaal Urges Caution as Man Utd Close In on Top Four
headline.print_headline: Van Gaal Urges Caution as Man Utd Close In on Top Four

lead_paragraph: Manager Louis van Gaal has urged Manchester United to be cautious as they closed in on the Premier League's top four after Tuesday's 1-0 win over Watford at Old Trafford.

snippet: Simon Francis will miss Bournemouth's FA Cup third round tie against Birmingham City after the Football Association rejected his club's appeal against his red card in the goalless draw against Leicester City on Saturday....

headline.main: Bournemouth Lose Appeal Against Francis' Red Card
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Lose Appeal Against Francis' Red Card

lead_paragraph: Simon Francis will miss Bournemouth's FA Cup third round tie against Birmingham City after the Football Association rejected his club's appeal against his red card in the goalless draw against Leicester City on Saturday.

snippet: Some people will do anything to watch Manchester United play at Old Trafford....

headline.main: Old Trafford Sleepover: United Fans Hid in Bathroom
headline.print_headline: Old Trafford Sleepover: United Fans Hid in Bathroom

lead_paragraph: Some people will do anything to watch Manchester United play at Old Trafford.

snippet: Swansea City are looking to bolster their attacking firepower and are targeting two strikers before the new season, the Premier League club's chairman Huw Jenkins said....

headline.main: Swansea Chairman Reassures Fans About Further Signings
headline.print_headline: Swansea Chairman Reassures Fans About Further Signings

lead_paragraph: Swansea City are looking to bolster their attacking firepower and are targeting two strikers before the new season, the Premier League club's chairman Huw Jenkins said.
